short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily export all your Twitter/X bookmarks to a JSON file with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Short description: 
Export all your Twitter/X bookmarks to JSON with one click.

Detailed description:
Twitter Bookmark Exporter lets you easily save all your Twitter/X bookmarks to a JSON file. Perfect for backup or analysis.

Features:
• One-click export of all bookmarks
• Saves tweets with full context (text, author, timestamp, link)
• Works with both Twitter.com and X.com
• Progress indicator while collecting bookmarks
• Automatic scrolling to capture all bookmarks
• Export as structured JSON data

How to use:
1. Navigate to your Twitter/X bookmarks page
2. Click the extension icon
3. Click "Export Bookmarks"
4. Choose where to save your bookmarks file
